      • covers

        boolean covers(BoundingBox other)
        Tests if the BoundingBox other lies wholely inside this BoundingBox (inclusive of the boundary).
        Parameters:
        other - the BoundingBox to check
        Returns:
        true if this BoundingBox covers the other

      • covers

        boolean covers(double x,
             double y)
        Tests if the given point lies in or on the envelope.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point which this BoundingBox is being checked for containing
        y - the y-coordinate of the point which this BoundingBox is being checked for containing
        Returns:
        true if (x, y) lies in the interior or on the boundary of this BoundingBox.

      • covers

        boolean covers(Geometry geometry)

      • covers

        boolean covers(Point point)
        Tests if the given point lies in or on the envelope.
        Parameters:
        p - the point which this BoundingBox is being checked for containing
        Returns:
        true if the point lies in the interior or on the boundary of this BoundingBox.

      • distance

        double distance(BoundingBox env)
        Computes the distance between this and another BoundingBox. The distance between overlapping BoundingBoxs is 0. Otherwise, the distance is the Euclidean distance between the closest points.

      • distance

        double distance(Geometry point)

      • intersection

        BoundingBox intersection(BoundingBox env)
        Computes the intersection of two BoundingBoxs.
        Parameters:
        env - the envelope to intersect with
        Returns:
        a new BoundingBox representing the intersection of the envelopes (this will be the null envelope if either argument is null, or they do not intersect

      • intersects

        boolean intersects(BoundingBox other)
        Check if the region defined by other overlaps (intersects) the region of this BoundingBox.
        Parameters:
        other - the BoundingBox which this BoundingBox is being checked for overlapping
        Returns:
        true if the BoundingBoxs overlap

      • intersects

        boolean intersects(double x,
                 double y)
        Check if the point (x, y) overlaps (lies inside) the region of this BoundingBox.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-ordinate of the point
        y - the y-ordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true if the point overlaps this BoundingBox

      • intersects

        boolean intersects(double x1,
                 double y1,
                 double x2,
                 double y2)
        Check if the line (x1, y1) -> (x2, y2) intersects (covered by or crosses) the region of this BoundingBox.
        Returns:
        true if the line overlaps this BoundingBox

      • intersects

        Check if the point p overlaps (lies inside) the region of this BoundingBox.
        Parameters:
        p - the Coordinate to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the point overlaps this BoundingBox

               double deltaY)

      • toGeometry

        Geometry toGeometry()
        Creates a Geometry with the same extent as the given envelope. The Geometry returned is guaranteed to be valid. To provide this behaviour, the following cases occur:

        If the BoundingBoxDoubleGf is:

        • null : returns an empty Point
        • a point : returns a non-empty Point
        • a line : returns a two-point LineString
        • a rectangle : returns a Polygon> whose points are (minx, miny), (minx, maxy), (maxx, maxy), (maxx, miny), (minx, miny).
        Parameters:
        envelope - the BoundingBoxDoubleGf to convert
        Returns:
        an empty Point (for null BoundingBoxDoubleGfs), a Point (when min x = max x and min y = max y) or a Polygon (in all other cases)

      • toPolygon

        Polygon toPolygon()
